passSectionContent.description: Join for two unforgettable nights of music, energy, and pure celebration at Swastika 2026.

selection.title: Select Tickets
selection.subtitle: Choose passes for you and your friends

details.title: Day 1 Access - February 20
details.description: Experience the energy of MQUBE BAND live! Your pass grants you entry to the Day 1 Proshow.

details.title: Day 2 Access - February 21
details.description: Get ready for the electrifying performance of FEJO! Don't miss the biggest night of Swastika '26.

details.title: All Access Combo
details.description: The ultimate Swastika experience! Get seamless access to both proshows.
